inclusion.criterion: Confirmed liver cirrhosis as documented by liver biopsy, elastography (e.g. Fibroscan) or combination of usual radiological and biochemical criteria.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Overt neurologic diseases such as Alzheimer's disease, Parkinson's disease
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease and is complaining of slowness of movement and tremors. He does not have any signs of dementia.
